Module it.polimi.ingsw.psp17
Package it.polimi.ingsw.connection

Interface RemoteServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Server
public interface RemoteServer extends Remote
RemoteServer interface used to expose useful server methods

  • Method Details

    • joinGame

      void joinGame(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler, String gameName) throws RemoteException
      Add a client to a game via its connectionHandler
      Parameters:
      connectionHandler - the connectionHandler to save in a game
      gameName - the game to add the player to
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if errors occur during RMI connection

    • createGame

      void createGame(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler, int numberOfPlayers, String gameName) throws RemoteException
      Create a new game
      Parameters:
      connectionHandler - the client handler of the game's creator
      numberOfPlayers - the number of players for the new game
      gameName - the name of the new game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if errors occur during RMI connection

    • checkUniqueNickname

      boolean checkUniqueNickname(String nickname) throws RemoteException
      Check if the nickname is unique in all the games
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname
      Returns:
      true if no other player with the same nickname
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if errors occur during RMI connection

    • removeClient

      void removeClient(ConnectionHandler connectionHandler) throws RemoteException
      Remove and disconnect a client
      Parameters:
      connectionHandler - the connectionHandler relative to the client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if errors occur during RMI connection

    • getGamesNames

      ArrayList<String> getGamesNames() throws RemoteException
      Get all the games' names
      Returns:
      the names of the not yet started games
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if errors occur during RMI connection
